title: 13.4.5 Data encryption at rest and in transit
body:
# Objective
Ensure all data is encrypted at rest and in transit using industry-standard encryption algorithms and key management.

## Requirements
- Enable RDS encryption at rest with KMS
- Enable EBS volume encryption for all volumes
- Configure S3 bucket encryption
- Enable ElastiCache encryption
- Implement TLS 1.2+ for all communications
- Encrypt backups and snapshots
- Use AWS KMS for key management
- Implement key rotation policies
- Encrypt application secrets
- Audit all data flows for encryption
- Document encryption architecture

## Acceptance Criteria
- All databases encrypted at rest
- All storage volumes encrypted
- All network traffic uses TLS 1.2+
- KMS keys created with rotation enabled
- Backups and snapshots encrypted
- Application data encrypted before storage
- Encryption verified with security audit
- Key management procedures documented
- No plaintext sensitive data found

## Dependencies
- Parent: Epic 13 (#131)
- Requires: #141 (RDS), #144 (Redis), #152 (Secrets Manager)
- Required for: #163 (SOC 2 readiness)

## Estimated Effort
**Story Points:** 8
**Time:** 1.5 weeks
**Complexity:** Medium-High
